FortressBot

Moderation Discord bot

A moderation-focused discord bot capable of auto-deleting server invite links and auto-cleaning of usernames or nicknames

StatusBot

Notifier Discord bot

A special discord bot made to notify users of other bots going offline

TridentFrame

Desktop GIF/APNG manipulation tool

The desktop swiss army knife of GIFs, APNGs and spritesheets with a wide range of features and a modern UI

Rhombus

C# OCR Discord bot

A discord bot with OCR (Optical Character Recognition) capabilities
